dataDescriptions.axisPadding: percentage of diagram space between the primary and secondary and primary and stratigraphy axes
dataDescriptions.canvasPadding: percentage of space between the stratigraphy column or primary axis and the first curve axis
dataDescriptions.curvePadding: percentage of diagram space between the curve max and the next curves axis
dataDescriptions.Ygrouping: percentage of diagram space allotted to the grouping on the top
dataDescriptions.Ynames: percentage of diagram space allotted to top names
dataDescriptions.Ybottom: percentage of diagram space allotted to the bottom labels
dataDescriptions.primaryAxis: percentage of diagram space allotted to the primary axis area
dataDescriptions.secondaryAxis: percentage of diagram space allotted to the secondary axis area, if it exists
dataDescriptions.stratigraphyCol: percentage of diagram space to be allotted to the stratigraphy column, if it exists
dataDescriptions.defaultPadding: percentage of diagram space allotted to spacing between names
dataDescriptions.titleTop: percentage of diagram space between the top of the plot and the top of the plot title
dataDescriptions.titleLeft: percentage of diagram between the left of the plot and the start of the plot title
dataDescriptions.namePadding: percentage of diagram space between the top of diagram and the start of the name in the Y direction
dataDescriptions.labelSize: experimental font sizing technique for top labels
dataDescriptions.axisTickSize: experimental font sizing technique for axis ticks
dataDescriptions.initialNameOffset: percentage of diagram space that offsets the name from the y-axis of the FIRST curve
dataDescriptions.otherNameOffset: percentage of diagram space that offsets the name from y-axis of curve 2->n
dataDescriptions.mainZoneLabelSize: font size multiplier for the zone label
dataDescriptions.subZoneLabelSize: font size multiplier for the subzone labels
dataDescriptions.zoneLabelOffset: percentage of diagram space for the zone labels to be offset from the righthand size of the diagram (X-pixels)
dataDescriptions.stratigraphyLabels: percentage of diagram space allotted to the labels for the stratigraphy textures underneath the diagram
dataDescriptions.stratPadding: percentage of diagram space allotted to shifting the stratigraphy column to the right
dataDescriptions.titleSize: font sizing multiplier for the plot title
dataDescriptions.primaryAxisTitleOffset: percentage of diagram space to offset the primary label from the x-end of the axis (x-pixels)
dataDescriptions.primaryAxisUnitsOffset: percentage of diagram space to offset the primary units from the x-end of the axis (to the left in x-pixel)
dataDescriptions.stratigraphyNameOffset: percentage of diagram space to offset the stratigraphy label from the x-end of the column (left in x-pixels)
dataDescriptions.backgroundColor: color for the background rectangle behind the plot elements
dataDescriptions.bottomLabelPadding: percentage of diagram space between the plot and the bottom label for each taxon
dataDescriptions.groupHeightOffset: percentage of height to offset labels ==> must make 45* angle
